items.value: XCoder want to make Business with you!

Arr.. you again! :o)
Well, now you are here.. you also can grow inside here!
You can sell it to me if you got:

5x Ganja Baggie

for me, i give you:
€ 250
i forgot why you are here?
ye.. i have 5x Baggie (Ganja) with me!
sorry i dont have any Ganja Bag with me!

You ask too many questions but okay ...
I'm XCoder, a smart Person that love dark hidden Rooms?!..
and yeh.. the Developer of the following Mods:

- LifeBalancer
- StackBalancer
- BestFriends

and other mods that I will develop!
it's nice to have met you!
i see! Where did we stop?
Cool Story Bro! I need to go..

Mhhhh they smell good!
Did you do it yourself, you are a natural!

You get:
€ 250

I hope to see you again soon and look at the homepage for updates to my mods. I also make new mods more often!

Unfortunately you have nothing suitable with you!
Come back if you have smelly Ganja Baggie's :o)

Take care o7
